Create a new Employee

int  deptSize,
int  salSize 
)

Prompt the user to enter an Employee's information then create and print out a new employee with the entered information

Parameters:
nameSize The maximum number of characters that can be entered for name
deptSize The maximum number of characters that can be entered for department
salSize The maximum number of digits that can be entered for salary
